statements: DELETE FROM ChangeOrders WHERE project_id = 100 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM ChangeOrders WHERE description LIKE '%urgent%' AND project_id = 200;
DELETE FROM project_revisions WHERE revision_name = 'Final Revision';
DELETE FROM project_revisions WHERE project_id = 101 AND revision_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM change_orders WHERE project_id = 1 AND order_id = 10;
DELETE FROM project_revisions WHERE revision_date < '2022-08-01' AND project_id = 5;
DELETE FROM project_team WHERE project_id = 1 AND role = 'Manager';
